stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  INSPIRATIONAL
comments: Dr. DeBlasio is a great teacher if you need someone to whip you into shape. She takes no crap. And if you\'re not going to work for it, you\'re not going to pass.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: Worst professor I\'ve ever had. She\'s VERY unclear about the material that will be on exams. The exams are essay only and rarely follow along with what was covered in lecture.. speaking of, lectures are LONG and very boring, making it hard to stay focused. She is a smart person who knows what she is talking about, just not the best professor.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She\'s a TOUGH grader. Expect Lots of hmwrk, Not 1 day you come to class without havin something to turn in. All exams r take home but they\'re extremely long ALL essays. Think you wrote enough write more! She wants every little detail explained. Lots of reading. Expect 8-10 page paper about mandatory service hours. Would NOT recommend. Jus too much

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Took Deblasio for Theologies of Christian Art. I am not really into art so the class was boring at times. Tests were originally in class but were EXTREMELY difficult because of all of the new information but she eventually made the tests take home. DO NO take your phone out or she\'ll flip. Overall, show up and participate and you\'ll be fine.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: From reading past reviews, I was really nervous about this class. We missed a week of school at the beginning of the semester and she was great at adjusting the assignment deadlines so that they were manageable. Do your assignments, study what she tells you to, and don\'t use your phone in class! I got an A and you can too!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is very smart, but the class was boring, her test are essay only! It was difficult because I\'m not real religious which made it hard.

comments: Second time taking her and it still turned out for the worst. I usually wouldn\'t do this but she is horrible she messed up my gpa and didn\'t see a problem with it I know I will never take her again. She start off nice then start changing.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: TERRIBLE. She only sides with her opinion but makes you think yours is correct, make this class nothing but boring, and barely teaches. What you talk about in lecture has little to nothing to do with what is on the exams. If there is a way around taking REL101 with her, choose the alternative.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Absolutely terrible at getting back with you in a timely manner, grades take weeks for her to put up. Awful decision choosing this professor, the class would be relatively interesting with anyone else. Very stubborn and one-sided, her side. I would never recommend her.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: A ton of homework, you will read that book cover to cover, if you don\'t mind that then I would rec\'d her. Her tests are take home usually and as long as you read the req\'d material you will do fine.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Tests weren\'t too bad, but she was ridiculous on grading. She would always say there wasn\'t enough clarity behind my answers, even though I would type at least a paragraph and a half on exams. It\'s her way or no way. Would not recommend taking this teacher.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Professor DeBlasio is by far the best Mercy has to offer. She is willing to help any student at anytime if they are willing to try. Mercy is a Catholic college and she does teach religion classes so a christian insight should be expected.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Very interesting class. It wasn\'t boring because of in-class discussions. She likes students who participate in these discussions. Go to class and participate and you will be fine.
